shortdesc.ph: Blur intensity of custom background images.

plentry.pd: (1): Applies a low level of blur to the custom background image, allowing users to see the background clearly.
(2): Applies a medium level of blur to the custom background image, making it difficult for users to recognize background details.
(3): (Default) Applies a high level of blur to the custom background image, making it nearly impossible for users to distinguish background features.
